[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thirdweb-dev/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [SignatureDrop](./sdk.signaturedrop.md)

## SignatureDrop class

Setup a collection of one-of-one NFTs that are minted as users claim them.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SignatureDrop extends Erc721<SignatureDropContract> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Erc721](./sdk.erc721.md)<!-- -->&lt;SignatureDropContract

## Example


```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

// You can switch out this provider with any wallet or provider setup you like.
const provider = ethers.Wallet.createRandom();
const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK(provider);
const contract = sdk.getNFTDrop("{{contract_address}}");
```
